=== Welcome to the U.S. SouthEast Team ===

US-SouthEastTeam is the Ubuntu user group for the city of Atlanta in the state of Georgia in the United States.  Any adjoining states (Alabama, Florida, North and South Carolina, and Tennessee should feel free to participate.  Our goal is to have regular meetings in the near Atlanta Metro area.

It was started by twknox ([MAILTO] twknox@gmail.com.com). you can message the group by emailing [MAILTO] ubuntu-usse@lists.ubuntu.com

To join the group, [WWW] join the discussion list Also, edit this page and put your name on the list of members.

Goals

*** I am interested in providing as much help to local ubuntu users as possible.
*** I would like to setup a monthly meeting, Please email me!
*** Spread ubuntu
